p: The studied Nigella sativa seeds originate from five countries: Saudi Arabia, India, Syria, France, and Morocco. The determination of the scientific name of plant species was performed, verified, and confirmed with a taxonomist/professional botanist using live specimens and photographs. For the accuracy of the identification of plant species, we have referred to specialized documents related to Moroccan flora. A specimen was deposited at the faculty herbarium under the voucher number (HUMPOM471) [ 9â€“ 14].
